pgrid.core.index
Class DBView

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.index.DBView

public class DBView
extends Object

Title: DBView

Description: A utility class to generate a "View" of the tables, i.e. generate SQL queries and subqueries

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mark Kornfilt
